results.title: [Effect of Naoxintong capsule on endothelial progenitor cell mobilization and homing following bone marrow transplantation in a mouse hind limb ischemia model].
results.text_hl: There was no significant difference in the percentage of GFP positive cells between BMT @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and GFP @SPECIES_10090 @@@transgenic mice@@@. NXT and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could significantly increase the number of peripheral @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ EPCs 1,3 days after surgery.
